description: Estimate the probability distribution over first-appearance times for each molecule in a RAF simulator. Use generate_samples(T, runs, snapshot_times, extras=["first_hits"], macro_params={"seed": ...}) to obtain data, then return probabilities for every snapshot time and the 'none' event per molecule and simulator seed.

api.instructions: Use generate_samples(T, runs, snapshot_times, extras=["first_hits"], macro_params={"seed": ...}) to obtain trajectories per macro seed. Compute first-appearance distributions per molecule; output probabilities keyed by macro seed -> species -> category (snapshot time as string or 'none').
